casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Luis Alberto RODRIGUEZ
and
Matthew L. Gregory, Bail Agent
and
Financial Casualty & Surety, Surety No. 35P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Kristopher L. Caudle, Attorney at Law, Richard A. Schwartz, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Brian C. Shaw, Attorney at Law, for Dare County Board of Education. Phillip H. Feagan, Attorney at Law. Phillip H. Hayes, Jr., Attorney at Law, Kitty Hawk, for Gregory, Matthew L. (Bail Agent)

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 24th of January 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
